title: Ground News - New ‘weapon’ to fight GBV epidemic packs a punch
text:
Summary by Times Live The notion that knowledge is power is behind the launch of a new booklet aimed at guiding traditional leaders’ fight violence against women and children Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
